parameter.value: I have no job. I just live to serve the gods, preferably by helping other people.
If you are heavily wounded or poisoned, I can heal you.
Casteldine is where we are right now. You must be new here...
My name is Morris. Quite peculiar, isn't it?
The temple is my second home. I feel the presence of the gods in here.
The depot is to the north. Worth a visit, I believe. Speak to Joseph there, he may help you.
Lithaton is the main continent here. It's big, I have never been further than the swamps in the north.
I am loyal to the king. Long live him.
I am loyal to the king. Long live him.
Doc is an unholy man, who believe the sword is better than words. I wish not to speak more of him.
Zertic is not to be mentioned in this holy temple. He is a murderer.
Joseph can help you with the depot if you don't know how it works.
A man of honour, really. He once saved Casteldine from the evil orcs.
Did you know the orcs once was close to seize Casteldine, and that Natalon and his men saved us?
The path of a warrior is nothing for you.

The isle of fame is where the ceremony hall is located. Also, certain persons are honoured there.
Quest? Well, I think I can grant you a blessed wooden stake. Somehow.
Welcome, young |PLAYERNAME|. If you need my help I will be here for you.
May the gods forever bless you, |PLAYERNAME|.
